prompt: good day. this morning i coughed for the very first time in a long time. with the corona virus around i feel the need to report this. i coughed for about 5 min. i have no fever, not tired and chest feels weird. what should i do?
completion: in brief: best to stay home right now stay home, consult here. disinfect everything and stay safe. we are here to answer your questions. would you like to video or text chat with me?

prompt: can the meat i eat give me coronavirus? will cooking kill the coronavirus?
completion: cooking will kill. cooking adequately will kill the virus-30 sec of ,microwave.

prompt: my fiancé has been coughing uncontrollably every night for the past 4 months. he is 23 years old, 5'9", about 140 lbs., and has been told by his dr that he has walking pneumonia. he has been prescribed antibiotics, cough syrup, allergy medicine, mucinex, nasal sprays, and inhalers and although they suppress the coughing at times he still does not seem to have gotten rid of the coughing. his coughing is accompanied with phlegm and has also caused him to throw up due to the extremity. he does smoke cigars as well. what is this!?
completion: walking pneumonia is a non-medical term to describe a mild case of pneumonia. it is usually called atypical pneumonia because the disease is different from more serious cases of pneumonia caused by typical bacteria. it is often the result of a lung infection from a bacterial microorganism called mycoplasma pneumoniae and generally treated with antibiotics. mild infections are often not treated because they tend to clear on their own. with treatment, most people begin to feel better within a few days.

prompt: 2 days ago i started experiencing fatigue and random body pains, mostly below the ribs and body temp was high as i was sweating and feeling cold. gp give me flue medication and advice against testing for corona. should i insist on testing for corona?
completion: in brief: no,you shouldnt. unless you have a history of international travel recently or were in contact with someone who has tested positive for corona virsu. would you like to video or text chat with me?
